name: ᴠᴀʟʟᴇᴤ
description:
ᴠᴀʟʟᴇᴤ is based on Valles Marineris, a system of canyons running through the Martian surface - a place which we might call our second home in a not-so-distant future. the animation represents the extraterrestrial activity often associated with the planet, with rings of signals being broadcast outward.

this is part of my 𝐜𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐯𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 collection. it combines my love for space & astronomy, with an abstract monochrome art style. every artwork is a satisfying infinite loop of motion.
